title: Simple Past vs Past Continuous
content: I [was watching|watched] TV when he called.
explanationEnUs: Action in progress (watching) interrupted by another action (called).
explanationZhTw: 正在進行的動作 (watching) 被另一個動作 (called) 打斷。
explanationZhCn: 正在进行的动作 (watching) 被另一个动作 (called) 打断。

title: Past Continuous
content: At 8 PM yesterday, we [were eating|ate] dinner.
explanationEnUs: Action in progress at a specific time in the past.
explanationZhTw: 過去特定時間正在進行的動作。
explanationZhCn: 过去特定时间正在进行的动作。

title: Past Perfect
content: When I arrived, the train [had left|left].
explanationEnUs: Action happened before another past action.
explanationZhTw: 發生在另一過去動作之前的動作。
explanationZhCn: 发生在另一过去动作之前的动作。

title: Past Perfect
content: She realized she [had forgotten|forgot] her keys.
explanationEnUs: The forgetting happened before the realizing.
explanationZhTw: 忘記發生在意識到之前。
explanationZhCn: 忘记发生在意识到之前。

title: Used To
content: I [used to|use to] live in London.
explanationEnUs: Past habit or state that is no longer true.
explanationZhTw: 過去的習慣或狀態，現在已不再是。
explanationZhCn: 过去的习惯 or 状态，现在已不再是。

title: Simple Past
content: He [didn't go|didn't went] to work yesterday.

title: Past Continuous
content: While I was cooking, he [was reading|read].
explanationEnUs: Two parallel actions happening at the same time.
explanationZhTw: 兩個同時發生的平行動作。
explanationZhCn: 两个同时发生的平行动作。

title: Past Perfect Continuous
content: I [had been waiting|was waiting] for an hour when the bus finally came.
explanationEnUs: Action continuing up to a point in the past.
explanationZhTw: 持續到過去某一點的動作。
explanationZhCn: 持续到过去某一点的动作。

title: Past Continuous
content: It [was raining|rained] when we left the house.
explanationEnUs: Background action happening when something else happened.
explanationZhTw: 當另一件事發生時正在發生的背景動作。
explanationZhCn: 当另一件事发生时正在发生的背景动作。

title: Would vs Used To
content: Every summer, we [would|used to] go to the beach.
explanationEnUs: 'Would' can express past repeated actions but not states.
explanationZhTw: 'Would' 可表達過去重複動作，但不能表達狀態。
explanationZhCn: 'Would' 可表达过去重复动作，但不能表达状态。

title: Past Perfect
content: He was tired because he [had worked|worked] hard.
explanationEnUs: The working caused the tiredness (earlier action).
explanationZhTw: 工作導致疲勞（較早發生的動作）。
explanationZhCn: 工作导致疲劳（较早发生的动作）。
